attributes.comment:
There are many good and loving families who are not able to have more children of
their own or even to have any children of their own so they turn to the adoption
process to fulfill their family. International adoption is a wonderful opportunity for
many children who otherwise might not have the opportunity for a good life in the
United States. I understand from families that I have meant that adoption is a very
expensive process be it in the United States or internationally. It is very sad that
the fees continually have to be raised as this creates financial difficulties on the
adopting parents that could otherwise be monies well spent on the adopted
children going to these families. Please do not continue to raise the various fees
that are involved in the adoption process.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
